classData.comment:
/**
     * Modifies the CSS classes of the container items this layout is bound to.
     * Automatically gets triggered after changing the value of activeIndex.
     * Lazy loads items which use a module config containing a function.
     * @param {Number} value
     * @param {Number} oldValue
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Modifies the CSS classes of the container items this layout is bound to. Automatically gets triggered after changing the value of activeIndex. Lazy loads items which use a module config containing a function.
classData.name: afterSetActiveIndex

classData.comment:
/**
     * Initially sets the CSS classes of the container items this layout is bound to.
     * @param {Neo.component.Base} item
     * @param {Number} index
     * @param {Boolean} [keepInDom=false]
     */
classData.description: Initially sets the CSS classes of the container items this layout is bound to.
classData.name: applyChildAttributes

classData.description: Applies CSS classes to the container this layout is bound to
classData.name: applyRenderAttributes

classData.description: Loads a component.Base module which is defined via module: () => import('â€¦')
classData.name: loadModule

classData.comment:
/**
     * Removes all CSS rules from the container this layout is bound to.
     * Gets called when switching to a different layout.
     */
classData.description: Removes all CSS rules from the container this layout is bound to. Gets called when switching to a different layout.
classData.name: removeRenderAttributes
